name: In2raction
description:
In2raction is the Hardcore Platformer 2D game. As the name says, you will be jumping on platforms and solve some struggles using 2 characters (Adver & Guldberg) between which you can switch! The thing is that Adver crushes gems on his way, while Guldberg upgrades himself thanks to all that mess made by Adver. Together they help each other to make their way till the end. Enjoy :)

A game made for Global Startupcities GAMEJAM 2020.

Adver (the brown one) crushes gems ("E") and kills enemies. Guldberg picks these gems ("E") to upgrade himself (gives super jump, throw, push). 

If a gem fell down, you need to press "ESC" and do "restart". 

If Guldberg is invisible, then he died and you have to do "restart" also.

========================================

Controls

Arrow keys : Move Character

Space - Jump

E - Interaction

Q - Change Character

Escape: Menu

========================================

Team:

Aleksey Nesterov - Game Design

Vladimir Babi - Code

Roman Ostrovski - Sound Design

Maksimilian Korosteljov - Sound Design

Olga Zakharchenko - Finding Graphic Assets

========================================

Music

  • Original Track "In2raction" for Main Menu Theme by Maksimilian Korosteljov
  • Original Track  "Adv&ure" for In-Game Music by Roman Ostrovski
